Description: * Spirit Strike: {{PageRef|Melee}} damage reduced from 20% to 15%
* {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=Veil}} {{PageRef|Walker}}: Bullet Shield reduced from +200 to +150
* {{PageRef|Cosmic Veil|alt_name=Veil}} {{PageRef|Walker}}: Shield restore now takes 5s to fully regen
* {{PageRef|Yamato}}: {{PageRef|Shadow Transformation}} now causes you to be unable to die during the buff
* There is no longer a reinforcement trooper wave after {{PageRef|Guardian}}s and {{PageRef|Walker}}s die
